name: BackEnd JAVA REACT (Senior) / Remote
description:
Our team is looking for JAVA Back End Developer (Middle) to join our team building next-generation microservice-based enterprise applications. As a Back End Developer, you will be part of an agile team with Front End developers, Product Owners, and QA engineers. You will work with JAVA Spring Boot Framework, PostgreSQL, and GitLab

Job responsibilities:

  • Builds enterprise web applications through the full technology stack including backend server-based development, front-end server, and client-based development, database design, and integration.
  • Writes high-quality software code that utilizes unit testing to ensure a high degree of software craftsmanship.

Requirements:

  • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
  • Expertise in Java 8+, JPA, Spring Framework.
  • Understanding/experience in high-loaded microservice and cloud applications architecture.
  • Data/process modeling and database design skills (generic RDBMS, Elasticsearch).
  • Good verbal and written communications skills in English are required.

We welcome:

  • Understanding/experience in building and deploying cloud-based apps and specifically Spring Cloud.
  • Experience in building secure, high-load optimized applications.
  • Experience in development projects for Hospitality / Wellness / Retail industries.
  • English language knowledge both written and spoken.

We offer:

  • Multinational enthusiastic environment.
  • Motivating remuneration package.
  • Wide opportunities for professional growth within our fast-growing company.
  • Remote work.
